segments.text: Can you recommend some popular tour ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Two weeks and I would like to go abroad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The popular tour of the season is a 14 - days ' sightseeing to Venice . Are you interested in that city ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . I will book the tour .
segments.speaker: S2
